15. Kd2?! - here I was indecisive as to where to put my king.  I thought that this was as good a way to connect the rooks than castling as the queens were off the board.  However, I was to pay for that moment of blind indecision over the next few moves.

25. ......... dxe5 - normally if you are behind on material you are advised to exchange pawns and not to exchange pieces.  However there is a dual purpose in this.  Black's central pawn structure is now compromised and the bishops are on opposite colours, meaning that I could try to exchange rooks if given the opportunity and increase my drawing chances.  Lighttotheright gave me no such opportunity.  Those rooks will soon be lethal!
